org.xchain.framework.strategy

Interface LoadStrategy<T,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object to be loaded.
    S - The source class to be loaded from.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachingLoadStrategy

    public interface LoadStrategy<T,S>
    Interface for loading strategies. A loading strategy is responsible for invoking the consumer with the given source strategy and creating the final object.
    Author:
    Devon Tackett, Christian Trimble

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getObject(java.lang.String systemId, SourceStrategy<S> sourceStrategy, ConsumerStrategy<T,S> consumerStrategy)
      Load the object identified by the given systemId.

    • Method Detail

      • getObject

        T getObject(java.lang.String systemId,
          SourceStrategy<S> sourceStrategy,
          ConsumerStrategy<T,S> consumerStrategy)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Load the object identified by the given systemId.
        Parameters:
        systemId - The identifier for the object to be loaded.
        sourceStrategy - The strategy for getting the source for the object.
        consumerStrategy - The strategy for turning the source into a proper object.
        Returns:
        The specified object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
